title: Vangelis - Blade Runner (2013 Audio Fidelity) [FLAC]
description:
First released in 1994, this 2013 release of Vangelis' "Blade Runner" album has been remastered by Kevin Gray for Audio Fidelity.

Source is Hybrid SACD, but this is 'just' the CD layer (44.1KHz/16bit) in lossless FLAC with .cue file and Dynamic Range anaylsis. Credit goes to flac_jacket of avaxho.me

01. Main Titles (3:42)
02. Blush Response (5:47)
03. Wait for Me (5:27)
04. Rachel's Song (4:46)
05. Love Theme (4:56)
06. One More Kiss, Dear (3:58)
07. Blade Runner Blues (8:53)
08. Memories of Green (5:05)
09. Tales of the Future (4:46)
10. Damask Rose (2:32)
11. Blade Runner (End Titles) (4:40)
12. Tears in Rain (3:00)
